title: McCarrs Creek Road, Church Point
content:
The homeowners of this residence approached Inhaus Living with a clear objective: To breathe new life into their traditional property by transforming it into a light-filled, contemporary sanctuary.

Their dream was to create a home that felt open, airy and effortlessly connected to the outdoors, perfect for both everyday comfort and stylish entertaining.

To make this vision a reality, the Inhaus Living team looked at the whole home and gave each room a fresh new layout to improve how it works, feels, and looks.

Seamless Indoor-Outdoor Flow: We restructured the floor plan into an open-plan layout and installed expansive glass doors that open out onto a newly designed outdoor entertaining area. This design invites natural light throughout the home and fosters an easy transition between indoor living and outdoor relaxation.

Contemporary Kitchen: A sleek, modern kitchen was created as the heart of the home, featuring a harmonious mix of crisp white cabinetry and slight warm wood finishes. A streamlined island bench offers both functionality and a sophisticated focal point for family gatherings or casual meals.

Elegant Bathrooms: The bathrooms were upgraded with neutral tones, marble-look finishes, and minimalist fixtures to evoke a spa-like feel. Each bathroom was created with simplicity and luxury in mind, ensuring a timeless appeal.

Natural Texture and Warmth: Timber flooring was selected for its warmth and natural aesthetic, creating a grounded, cohesive feel throughout the home.

The result is a stunning, cohesive home that beautifully blends contemporary design with inviting warmth.

Every element from the open-plan living areas to the luxurious bathrooms has been thoughtfully curated to support modern living.
